text: The Amazon story has me thinking of a dynamic I see a lot now in politics. The safe spot, the political sweet spot, is to be for something, on moral or ethical grounds, that you know will never pass. Or against, for same reasons, a thing that will. 1.

text: 5. It was part of your duty and right as a citizen of Lodi, New Jersey to know what was going on with the town council, the mayor’s office. Local crime, the firehouse has a new truck. These stories were part of your homework as a citizen. And you read them...

text: 4. Is there less hunger now for local news?  Less of a market?  Years ago you read your local newspapers for school sports coverage, what’s on sale at Safeway, maybe the comics or cartoons. But you also read them because it was part of your job as a citizen.
